name: on_delete_cascade_rollback
description: Crash during parent delete with ON DELETE CASCADE must not commit partial parent/child deletions
setup_sql: CREATE TABLE parent (id INT PRIMARY KEY); CREATE UNIQUE INDEX parent_id_uq ON parent (id); CREATE TABLE child (id INT PRIMARY KEY, parent_id INT REFERENCES parent(id) ON DELETE CASCADE); INSERT INTO parent VALUES (1); INSERT INTO child VALUES (10, 1)

verify.post_crash_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM parent UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM child
